# extendedLanguageTag

**Instance Property**

The IETF BCP 47 (RFC 4646) language identifier of the metadata item.

## Declaration

```swift
var extendedLanguageTag: String? { get }
```

## Discussion

The value may be `nil` if no language tag information is available.

## Accessing language support

- **locale**: The locale of the metadata item.

items.description: The locale of the metadata item.
items.name: locale
